title: Get Microsoft Visual Studio and learn how to code for only $65
content:
Macworld

If learning to code was on your bucket list for 2024, then we have a great deal for you. You can now get lifetime access to Microsoft Visual Studio Professional 2022 and a comprehensive, beginner-friendly coding bundle for under $65.

Microsoft Visual Studio is a leading development environment trusted by developers worldwide. It has earned a 4.6 out of five-star rating on GetApp and Capterra for its ability to make coding workflows more efficient. The software’s 64-bit IDE makes it easier to write high-quality code across various platforms and languages in a single location. And with a host of advanced tools and built-in integrations, you can scale your programming productivity, collaborate on more complex coding projects, and more.

In addition, you’ll get 15 top-rated coding courses covering topics like Python, JavaScript, Ruby on Rails, game development, and even ChatGPT. Kids can even benefit from this programming package, as a kid-friendly coding and development course is included. All told, this comprehensive toolkit is helpful for anyone who wants to learn how to code, and some courses include certifications of completion for users to add to their resumes.

Get a coding education and gain the tools to apply it effectively when you get lifetime access to Microsoft Visual Studio Professional 2022 and the Learn to Code Bundle for just $64.99.

 

Microsoft Visual Studio Professional 2022 + The 2024 Premium Learn to Code Certification Bundle – $64.99

See Deal

StackSocial prices subject to change.
